title.rendered: New this year: Snowmobile in Vail with AVA

content.rendered:
Riding among some of the highest peaks in Colorado, diving in powder filled bowls, and flying down groomed runs all on a snowmobile? What could be better! Snowmobiles are the perfect means to escape. With unlimited terrain available in Vail Pass there is a lot to explore.

Snowmobiles are a great way to venture into the backcountry. In an area such as Vail, with so much to see and do, a car may not always get you there. On the other hand, a snowmobile provides users with unlimited access to the backcountry.

This year AVA is offering snowmobile rentals on Vail Pass. Starting November 28th for rent, with beginner and advanced level trails right out our back door, there is much to see and explore. Snowmobiling makes for a great family activity and with children 16 and older allowed to ride alone, there is sure to be fun had, no matter the age.

With half day rentals starting at 9am and 12pm, offering 3 hours of ride time, and a full day at 9am with 7 hours of ride time, you can fit snowmobiling into any schedule. With just a map and a safety talk you are ready to ride. With these rentals you are your own boss. Nobody tells you where you can and cannot go. You are in charge of your own adventure.

There is truly nothing better than being able to explore the way you want with unlimited access. Fortunately for you, Vail Pass has tons of terrain just waiting to be explored and there is simply no better way to venture than by snowmobile. This year come out and get exploring with a snowmobile rental!
